sentence.Network_en: The book is a demonstration of scholarship without pedantry.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书表现出学术水平又不故意卖弄学问.

sentence.Network_en: As a bel esprit he despised pedantry whether in a man or in a bluestocking.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一个才子,他看不起卖弄学问的作风,不管这种作风是由男人还是女才子所表现出来的.

sentence.Network_en: He had all the illumination of wisdom and none of its pedantry.
sentence.Network_cn: 他具有智慧的一切光辉,却没有丝毫学究的迂腐气息.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译a_专业词汇... ... pedantic 书生气的 pedantry 炫学 pedate 有脚的.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... mimicry 模仿，学样 pedantry 迂腐，卖弄学问 bigotry 顽固，偏执.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... pedant n 迂腐的教师，书呆子 pedantry n 迂腐的，卖弄学问 pedagogy n 教学法，教育学.
带P的有关学的方面的单词有哪些？_百度知道 ... premiun 学费 pedantry 学究气 preschool education 学前教育.

list.abs: Do not be deceived by the pedantry of dates ., 不要被欺骗的学究气的日期.
Do not be deceived by the pedantry of dates ., 不要被欺骗的学究气的日期.
Generation gap , conservation , reminiscence , pedantry and stubbornness all basically from that ., 代沟 , 保守 , 怀旧 , 迂腐顽固 , 基本都源于此.
As a bel esprit he despised pedantry whether in a man or in a bluestocking ., 作为一个才子 , 他看不起卖弄学问的作风 , 不管这种作风是由男人还是女才子所表现出来的.

entry.tran: 迂腐；过分拘泥于细节（或传统）；学究气
entry.def: If you accuse someone of pedantry, you mean that you disapprove of them because they pay excessive attention to unimportant details or traditional rules, especially in connection with academic subjects.

means.word_mean: 1. a ostentatious and inappropriate display of learning

auth_sentence.content: Natural history sank into a mire of unproductive pedantry.

auth_sentence.content: Criticism of the King's conduct is not mere pedantry.
auth_sentence.res_content: Criticism of the King's conduct is not mere pedantry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Criticism of the King's conduct is not mere pedantry.
